bannertext-privacy: Politiki yo kurinda Amakuru y’Imibereho bwite
index-welcome-head: Ikaze muri gahunda itanga amahirwe y'ibihembo
index-every-trans: Buri gikorwa cyo kwishyura ukoze kiguhesha amanota y'ibihembo bitangwa muri gahunda itanga amahirwe y'ibihembo.
index-your-pearl: Amanota aguhesha igihembo agukingurira imiryango yo kugura ibintu byiza binyuranye kuri interineti.
index-gift-toflight: inyandiko z'impano ziguhesha ingendo mu ndege, hoteli, n'ibindi byinshi. Kubaho bihebuje ntabwo bijya byoroha.
index-a-special: Amahitamo adasanzwe ateguye neza igihe ugiye gukoresha amanota yawe, hari ukugura ibintu binyuranye ukaba wajya no kwiyakirira ahantu hahebuje ndetse n'ibindi byinshi. Koeresha inyandiko y'ibyo wemererwa urebe ibintu byinshi ushobora guhitamo. Koresha amanota yawe aguheshe ibihembo nonaha.
index-nothing-is: Nta cyahuhesha ibihembo ku rusha gukoresha amakarita aguhesha impano ziri mu bintu byinshi  biba byagutoranyirijwe ku buryo bwihariye. Koresha amanota wabonye uhabwe ibihembo maze uryoherwe n'amahitamo adasanzwe y'iby'agahebuzo guhera none aha.
btn-redeem-yourpearl: Koresha amanota yawe kugirango uryoherwe bihebuje no kugura ibyo ukunda n'ibicuruzwa byubatse izina. Kwigurira ukagurira n'umuryango wawe ubu ni ibyishimo gusa kandi ku biciro byiza n'ibicuruzwa byiza.
index-travel-the: Tembere isi kandi ufate umwanya mu ndege mbere mu gihe uri mu rugendo, koresha amanota yawe aguhesha ibihembo nonaha. Hari ibigo mpuzamahanga bikora ingendo z'indege by'indashyikirwa ushobora guhitamo ugakora urugendo rutekanye kandi wishimiye kugeza wongeye kujya mu biruhuko.
index-a-unique: Uruvange rw'imbonekarimwe rw'imyubakire inoze hamwe n'umuco gakondo w'aho uzatemberera ubutaha bifatanyiriza hamwe kukuremera uburyohe udashobora na rimwe kuzibagirwa. Fata umwanya wawe mbere muri hoteli nonaha ukoresheje amanota yawe aguhesha igihembo.
index-an-undeniable: Uburyohe budahinyuka witemberera mu modoka nziza cyane ariko yihagazeho kugeza wongeye gutegura urugendo.Ibyo bikuzamurira ibyishimo kandi bikakuryohereza urugendo. Fata imodoka mbere  uzagendamo ubutaha ukoresheje amanota yawe aguhesha igihembo.
index-exchanging: Koresha amanota yawe XYZ ubone amahitamo y'agahebuzo atagira iherezo kandi mu buryo bworoshye cyane. Ryoherwa n'ibicuruzwa by'indashyikirwa ku biciro utasanga uhandi byaguteguriwe kugirango unezerwe.
index-gift-your: Ha abo ukunda umudendezo wo kwihitiramo impano bifuza bakoresheje amakarita y'impano yishyurwa mbere. Koresha amanota yawe aguhesha ibihembo wongere amafaranga ku ikarita yo kwishyura mbere kugirango babashe kuyikoresha bihahire ibyo bifuza.
text-our-versatile: Amakarita yacu y'impano yo kwishyura mbere mberabyombi ashobora gukoreshwa  mu kugura ibyo wifuza byose bitewe n'agaciro k'ikarita yawe.
redeem-select-how: Hitamo uburyo bwiza bwo gukoresha amanota yawe mu mahitamo menshi ahari, hari ingendo z'indege, amahoteli, ammodoka no gukoresha ibindi byinshi bitangwa n'ibigo bikomeye.
text-onetime-password: Ijambo banga rikoreshwa inshuro imwe (OTP) ryoherejwe kuri telefoni yawe wandikishije
text-once-recevied: Nubona OTP uhite uyishyiramo hasi hano kugirango usoze igikorwa cyo gusaba guhabwa umwanya mbere.
button-more-flights: Garagaza indege nyinshi zigiye gukora ingendo
car-details-accidents: Accidents covered - Your excess will be protected if your vehicle is damaged in an accident.
car-details-damage-cover: Damage cover - Damage to bodywork, vehicle parts and accessories incurred during most driving incidents is covered.
car-details-damage-excess: Gusubizwa amafaranga ku bwishingizi burenga urwego rusanzwe
car-details-excess-protection: Excess Protection - Excellent Value, Best Cover, Peace of Mind
car-details-when-you: When you pick up your car a deposit is usually held on your card for your excess which may be charged if the vehicle is damaged. Take our Gusubizwa amafaranga ku bwishingizi burenga urwego rusanzwe and if you have any bumps or scrapes we'll refund any deductions from your excess.
car-details-you-are: You're protected - Gusubizwa amafaranga ku bwishingizi burenga urwego rusanzwe protects you when things go wrong and you are required to pay out from your excess.
car-driverdetails-do: Ese ubu ufite amakuru y'indege igiye gukora urugendo?
car-error-page: Gerageza andi matariki cyangwa ibindi bihe kuko ku matariki cyangwa ku bihe watoranyije nta modoka zihari .
flight-error-page: Nta rugendo rw'indege ruhari hagati y'imijyi watoranyije muri aka kanya.
flight-search-page: Ihangane utegereze mu gihe turimo kugushakira ingendo z'indege zihari zikubereye kurushaho…
flightlist-airlines: Ikigo gikora ingendo zo mu ndege
flightlist-baggage-allowance: Uburemere bw'imizigo umugenzi yemerewe mu ndege
flightlist-carrier-flight: Ikigo gikora ubwikorezi na No y'urugendo rw'indege
flightlist-hide-flight: Hisha amakuru y'indege igiye gukora urugendo
forgotpassword-enter-your-rim: Shyiramo RIM yawe kugirango wakire umurongo kuri email wandikishije bityo ubashe kongera kwinjiza ijambo banga ryawe muri sisitemu
flightpassenger-error-correct-passport: Shyiramo nomero ya pasiporo nyayo. (nta mwanya usigara nta nta n'umwanya usigara hagati y'inyuguti, n'ibimenyetso).
flightpassenger-error-enter-correctfirst: Shyirano izina ribanza nyaryo (no @, dot, - ,#, $, %, &, * and +)
flightpassenger-error-enter-correctlastn: Shyiramo izina ry'umuryango nyaryo (no @, dot, - ,#, $, %, &, * and +)
flightpassenger-error-passsport-expiry-d: Itariki izarangiriraho igomba kuba iruta itariki yatangiweho
flightpassenger-error-passsport-issue-da: Itariki yatangiweho igomba kuba iruta DOB
flightpassenger-expirty-date-greater: Itariki izarangiriraho igomba kuba iruta itariki yatangiweho
flightpassenger-issue-date-greater: Itariki yatangiweho igomba kuba iruta DOB
flightpassenger-please-reenter-email: Shyiramo bundi bushya ibiranga email yawe
flightpassenger-please-reenter-validemai: Shyiramo bundi bushya ibiranga email yawe by'ukuri
flightpassenger-ihave: Nasomye kandi nemeje amanota ampesha igihemo ya XYZ
flightpassenger-booking-cancel: Politiki yo gufata umwanya mbere no Kuwuvanaho
flightpassenger-ialso: Points. Ndasobanukiwe kandi nemeye ko amanota aguhesha ibihembo yamaze gukoreshwa ntibishoboka kuyasubizwa cyangwa kuyahabwa igihe  umwanya wari wafashe mbere mu ndege ukuweho.
gift-card-let-your: Reka impano yawe ibe idasanzwe nk'uko igitekerezo kibivuga. Hamwe n'ibihembo byateganyijwe koresha amanota yawe aguheshe  impano mu bigo biyoboye. Ufite guhitamo inyandiko ikwemerera impano muri nyinshi nziza zihari, kugirango urusheho kunezerwa kandi uko ubikoze bikubere urwibutso!
giftcardpurchase-yourtransaction: Igikorwa cyo kwishyura cyagenze neza…Inyandiko iguhesha igihembo yoherejwe kuri email yawe wandikishije
hotel-booking-bookingcancel: Politiki yo gufata umwanya mbere no Kuwuvanaho
hotel-booking-ialso: I also understand and accept that the redeemed Points cannot be refunded or credited upon cancellation of a hotel booking.
hotel-booking-ihave: Nasomye kandi nemeje amanota ampesha igihemo ya XYZ
hotel-error-page: Nta hoteli iboneka mu karere wahisemo.
managebooking-car-dropoff-label: Ibyerekeye kujyana umugenzi ku kibuga cy'indege
managebooking-car-pickup-label: Ibyerekeye gufata umugenzi ku kibuga cy'indege
managebooking-flight-booking-label: Itariki yo gufata umwanya mbere mu ndege
managebooking-flight-label: Ibyerekeye gufata umwanya mbere mu ndege
managebooking-hotel-booking-label: Itariki yo gufata umwanya mbere mu ndege
managebooking-hotel-label: Ibyerekeye gufata ibyumba mbere muri Hoteli
managebooking-voucher-label: Amakuru ari ku nyandiko y'ibyo wemerewe
mb-flight-booking-details: Ibyerekeye gufata umwanya mbere mu ndege
mb-hotel-booking-details: Ibyerekeye gufata ibyumba mbere muri Hoteli
note-all-timigs-local: Ingengabihe zose zikurikiza isaha y'imbere mu gihugu. Ibiciro ntibigaragazwa keretse igihe itiki yamaze gukorwa.
note-qib-absher-points: Amanota  yagaragajwe ngo aguheshe igihembo haba harimo ibiciro by'inyongera n'imisoro.
pe-please-select-the-year: Please select the year to view your point expiry schedule:
pe-points-going-expire: Points are going to expire on
text-from-delivery-message: Ikarita yawe yo kwishyura mbere izoherezwa ahatangirwa serivisi XYZ ku gice cya Cmu minsi 2 y'akazi guhera itariki gukoresha amanota byabereye.
text-please-accept-terms: Ugomba kwemera gukurikiza amategeko n'amabwiriza kugirango ubashe gukoresha amanota watsindiye.
text-qatar-post-delivery: Qatar POST delivery charge of 25 QR will be added in your total redeemed points.
text-quilent-against-qatar-post-delivery: The equivalent points against Qatar Post Delivery charges of 25 QR will be added in your total redeem points. Qatar Post delivery time is minimum 5 working days.
text-your-hadiyati-card-will-be-sent: Ikarita yawe yo kwishyura mbere izoherezwa ku kigo gitanga serivisi XYZ ku gice cya  C mu minsi 2 y'akazi uhereye itariki amanota yakoreshejweho
text-your-redemption-has-been-sent: Your redemption request has been well received. We will soon send your Prepaid card based on the selected delivery option.
topup-card-exchange-tag: Gukoresha amanota hagati ya za porogaramu!
topup-card-you-can: Ushobora gukoresha amanota yawe ku bwo kuba umukiriya w'umwizerwa ukayakoresha mu ngendo hamwe n'ibigo by'indege bifatanyabikorwa byacu  cyangwa ibindi bigo ukabona ibyiza wateganyirijwe
transaction-redemption-label: Ubwoko bw'igikorwa cyo kwishyura/Uko wakoresheje amanota
voucher-accespt-terms: Please accept the terms to proceed with the redemption.
voucher-domore: Do more with your loyalty points!
voucher-you-can-now: You can now redeem your points for a Voucher of your choice. Choose from a range of options from travel to shopping, and make gifting even more special!
vp-should-contain-capiltal: Should contain at least one capital case character
vp-should-contain-numeric: Should contain at least one numeric digit
vp-should-contain-small: Should contain at least one small case character
vp-should-contain-special: Should contain at least one special character (!@#$%0?)
miles-txt-enjoy: Enjoy redeeming points and exchanging them too!
miles-txt-younow: You now have access to a whole lot of loyalty programme(s) and can easily exchange your points!
miles-txt-you-have: لقد أتممت معاملتك بنجاح. تم إرسال بريد إلكتروني إلى البريد الإلكتروني المسجل الخاص بك.
text-voucher-desc: You can use the Kigali Gift Vouchers for any of our esteemed partners from Lifestyle brands to Fine Dine and much more.
text-select-quantity: Please select the quantity of gift vouchers you require:
noofpointsrequiredtoredeem: Number of Points required to redeem
pleasefindbelowBOKvouchersummary: Please find below your Kigali Voucher Summary
pleaseclickonconfirmtoredeem: Please click on Confirm below to redeem
PointsforaGiftVoucherofQAR: for a Gift Voucher of QAR
redeemyourpoints: Koresha amanota yawe kugirango ubone ibihembo byinshi binyuranye.
redeem-intro-copy:
Kigali’s Pearl Rewards Programme is one of the best rewards programme in Qatar with more than 900 airlines, 450,000 hotels worldwide, car rentals in over 150 countries and a variety of products from leading brands.

Find more ways to make your relationship with Kigali Credit Cards even more rewarding.
redeem-description:
Maximise your Rewards with every transaction and redeem the way you like. Access anytime, anywhere with Kigali Mobile app and online banking.

Redeem your loyalty points for Free flights, car, hotel stays, Gift Cards, Gift Vouchers, Kigali Prepaid Gift Cards, lifestyle products and lots more!
redeem-gift-voucher-copy: It’s time to give your gifts a special touch. Redeem your points for gift vouchers of your favourite brands and give them to your loved ones. Click Here to check out our participating partners!
redeem-gift-card-copy: Get rewarded with exciting Gift Cards from a great range of products, handpicked especially for you. Redeem your Amanota aguhesha igihembo  and discover an incredible variety of options now.
redeem-shop-copy:
If you like shopping, you’re going to love this redemption option. Redeem your points for shopping your favourite products like apparel and electronics.
  • Convenience of shopping for electronics, books & household items online from the comfort of your home
  • Thousands of products to choose from
  • All leading brands available such as Apple, Sony, Samsung, Sony, Toshiba and many more.
  • Products will be home delivered anywhere in Qatar.
redeem-flight-copy:
If you’re making travel plans, this is a great redemption option for you. Choose from over 900 airlines and book your flights with your points!
  • With Pearl Rewards Programme, you’re not restricted to one airline or one departure point, and you can redeem your tickets online directly from more than 900 airlines around the world - including low-cost
  • No blackout dates: You can book and travel on any date you want.
  • Unrestricted: While residing in Doha, you can redeem your points for a flight from London to Paris, for yourself, family members or even friends.
  • Convenient: Log on from the comfort of your home or office.
  • Double benefit: Enjoy extra rewards by earning ‘Airline Frequent Flier Miles’ when you redeem your points to book tickets.
redeem-hotel-copy: Make your travel dreams come true. Take your pick from more than 450,000 hotels across the world and enjoy your holiday by Instant booking at the click of a button.!
redeem-car-copy: Traveling from one place to another is now easier with the option of renting a car in over 150 destinations worldwide.
redeem-points-exchange-copy: Make the most of your loyalty points by exchanging them! You can exchange your points for miles, gift cards or other redemption options from a wide network of brands. Click Here  to check out our partners!
redeem-prepaid-giftcard-copy: Redeem your Amanota aguhesha igihembo  for Kigali Prepaid Gift Cards,  accepted across all Point of Sales worldwide.
text-login-hint:
*Customer ID means the middle 6 digits of your account number
E.g. If your account number is 0001-123456-301, then your middle 6 digits is your Customer ID, which is 123456
